entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: A group of students at Hogwarts who are known for their intelligence and wisdom. They froze in response to the rap on the door.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He heard the soft, musical voice from the eagle door knocker.

entities.name: eagle door knocker
entities.description: A door knocker in the shape of an eagle that issued the soft, musical voice asking about Vanished objects.

entities.name: vanished objects
entities.description: Objects that have disappeared or gone missing. The eagle door knocker asked where they go.

entities.name: amycus carrow
entities.description: One of the Carrow siblings who is an unkind and uncouth person. He snarled at Harry Potter.

entities.name: alecto carrow
entities.description: The other Carrow sibling who is mentioned as being possibly involved in a situation with Harry Potter.

entities.name: malfoys
entities.description: A family of wizards that are known to be evil. Amycus threatened Harry Potter by mentioning them.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned in the context of 'The Sacking'.

relationships.description: Amycus threatened Harry Potter by mentioning the Malfoys.
Alecto is possibly involved in a situation with Harry Potter, as Amycus asked if she had him.
Amycus interacted with the eagle door knocker by asking it to open the door.
Harry Potter is associated with the Ravenclaws, as they were whispering amongst themselves in response to the situation.
